meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning a loop of intestine that has become twisted.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the volvuli in his intestines needed immediate attention.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon successfully untangled the volvuli in the patient's abdomen.
meanings.sent3: The volvuli in the digestive system decided to play a game of twister.
meanings.sent4: The volvuli were like tangled spaghetti, causing discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The image of the volvuli twisting like a pretzel stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: The plural form of volvulus, a condition in which a loop of intestine twists on itself, causing an obstruction.
meanings.sent1: The hospital treated multiple cases of volvuli last month.
meanings.sent2: The volvuli in the patient's abdomen required immediate surgery.
meanings.sent3: The volvuli at the party were causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The volvuli were like roadblocks in the digestive system.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the volvuli twisting like a tornado was alarming.
